channel.title: Customizing your Aryan - Do not use this to resell Aryan!
channel.description:
[b]Guide Policy:[/b] As said before, [b]DO NOT[/b] use this to edit the name and add some hotkeys and say it's a new bot. If I find out someone is doing it, I'll delete the guide. Most of this guide is common sence such as name changing but it makes your Aryan experience even more customised.
[b]Page Of Contents:[/b] [i]Name Changing[/i] [i]Resizing Aryan[/i] [i]Script Starting Hotkeys[/i]
[b]Name Changing:[/b] Difficulty: Easy First, the name change. To change the name at the top of your Aryan open bot.java and search for:
[code]private String frameTitle[/code]
To the right you should see:
[code]"Aryan"[/code]
Now change it to what you want to say at the top of the aryan, Compile classes and your done.
[b]Making Aryan Resizable:[/b] Difficulty: Easy
Open bot.java and search for:
[code]frame.setResizable(false);[/code]
Change the:
[code](false)[/code]
To:
[code](true)[/code]
[b]Adding Script-Starting Hotkeys:[/b] Difficult: Medium I've posted this many times before, so this is most likely my last time posting it.
Open bot.java and search for:
[code]VK_F7[/code]
This is basically the coding that makes it when you hit F7, an event happens, so now we want to add it so it will "Listen" for another event. So right below:
[code] } else if (evt.getKeyCode() == KeyEvent.VK_F7) { graphicsEnabled = !graphicsEnabled; log("Graphics are now " + (graphicsEnabled ? "enabled" : "disabled"));[/code]
Type:
[code] } else if (evt.getKeyCode() == KeyEvent.VK_F8) {[/code] This now add it's where it'll now "Listen" for the F8 key to be pushed and now you have to add something for it to do when F8 is pushed so now let's make it take the input for the essence mining script so add this under it.
[code]takeInput("/em()");[/code]
It should now look like this FYI:
[code] } else if (evt.getKeyCode() == KeyEvent.VK_F8) { takeInput("/em()"); [/code]
Now to add the finishing touches such as if you want it to say something in the CMD window for that just type log and then what you want like this: [code] } else if (evt.getKeyCode() == KeyEvent.VK_F8) { takeInput("/em()"); log("Your hotkey has now been touched, starting Essence Miner!"); } [/code]
Now once in game, you press F8 and it starts essence miner. [b] Will be updating this guide occasionally[/b]: Check back to see if I have updated from time to time.

item.title: Customizing your Aryan - Do not use this to resell Aryan!
item.dc:creator: @edycus edycus
item.description:
@edycus wrote:

I have a problem with the F key

I type in this (showing f7 for eample)

} else if (evt.getKeyCode() == KeyEvent.VK_F7) {
graphicsEnabled = !graphicsEnabled;
log("Graphics are now " + (graphicsEnabled ? “enabled” : “disabled”));
}

	} else if (evt.getKeyCode() == KeyEvent.VK_F8) {
              takeInput("/imp_uf2()");
              log("Your hotkey has now been touched, starting Essence Miner!");
	}

And I get this as an error

Bot.java:403: illegal start of type
} else if (evt.getKeyCode() == KeyEvent.VK_F8) {
^
Bot.java:409: expected
super.keyPressed(evt);
^
Bot.java:415: ‘class’ or ‘interface’ expected
public void focusGained(FocusEvent evt) {
^
Bot.java:782: ‘class’ or ‘interface’ expected
}
^
Bot.java:783: ‘class’ or ‘interface’ expected
^
5 errors
…\BotClasses\Bot.java:403: illegal start of type

Any suggestions?

Read full topic

item.title: Customizing your Aryan - Do not use this to resell Aryan!
item.dc:creator: @Crack_Miners Crack Miners
item.description:
@Crack_Miners wrote:

Guide Policy:
As said before, DO NOT use this to edit the name and add some hotkeys and say it’s a new bot. If I find out someone is doing it, I’ll delete the guide. Most of this guide is common sence such as name changing but it makes your Aryan experience even more customised.

Page Of Contents:
Name Changing
Resizing Aryan
Script Starting Hotkeys

Name Changing:
Difficulty: Easy
First, the name change. To change the name at the top of your Aryan open bot.java and search for:

private String frameTitle

To the right you should see:

"Aryan"

Now change it to what you want to say at the top of the aryan, Compile classes and your done.

Making Aryan Resizable:
Difficulty: Easy

Open bot.java and search for:

frame.setResizable(false);

Change the:

(false)

To:

(true)

Adding Script-Starting Hotkeys:
Difficult: Medium
I’ve posted this many times before, so this is most likely my last time posting it.

Open bot.java and search for:

VK_F7

This is basically the coding that makes it when you hit F7, an event happens, so now we want to add it so it will “Listen” for another event. So right below:

} else if (evt.getKeyCode() == KeyEvent.VK_F7) { graphicsEnabled = !graphicsEnabled; log("Graphics are now " + (graphicsEnabled ? "enabled" : "disabled"));

Type:

		} else if (evt.getKeyCode() == KeyEvent.VK_F8) {

This now add it’s where it’ll now “Listen” for the F8 key to be pushed and now you have to add something for it to do when F8 is pushed so now let’s make it take the input for the essence mining script so add this under it.

takeInput("/em()");

It should now look like this FYI:

		} else if (evt.getKeyCode() == KeyEvent.VK_F8) {
                  takeInput("/em()");

Now to add the finishing touches such as if you want it to say something in the CMD window for that just type log and then what you want like this:

		} else if (evt.getKeyCode() == KeyEvent.VK_F8) {
                  takeInput("/em()");
                  log("Your hotkey has now been touched, starting Essence Miner!");
		}

Now once in game, you press F8 and it starts essence miner.

Will be updating this guide occasionally:
Check back to see if I have updated from time to time.

Read full topic
item.source: Customizing your Aryan - Do not use this to resell Aryan!
